content.rendered:
A young botanist arrives in a small desert town to study a rare plant, but her survival soon becomes a matter of survival after the local mafia is on her trail.

Directed By Jesse Harris

Written By Jesse Harris

Stars: Lucy Hale. Nicholas Gonzalez. Jim Meskimen
